short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify profitable niche markets on Jumia marketplaces with the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Launching a new product doesn't have to be as costly, inaccurate or unpredictable anymore.

ProfitLantern is a free tool for vendors & global sellers to research their next best sellers and top selling products on Jumia marketplace.

Evaluate product opportunities quickly and easily in real-time, as you search Jumia's catalog by using product performance data with the most accurate data straight from the listings in the search results youâ€™re browsing.

How to use the extension

1. Install the extension on your chrome browser.

2. Visit your country's respective Jumia ecommerce website and search for the product you're interested in assessing the opportunity for.

3. Next, click the ProfitLantern extension and ProfitLantern will analyze the search results on that page and show you a snapshot of key product performance metrics i.e. Average Review Count, etc.

ProfitLantern currently works on Jumia marketplaces in the following countries :

Kenya
Algeria
Ivory Coast
Egypt
Ghana
Morocco
Nigeria
Senegal
Tunisia
Uganda
South Africa
Zando

If you have any questions, suggestions or need help from us, drop us a line at nichevitality@gmail.com and we'll be glad to help.
